title: Life Philosophy

choices: Living in the moment and enjoying life

questions.text: When setting goals, I focus on...
My approach to work-life balance is...
choices: Work hard, play hard - both deserve 100%
Work is part of life, not separate from it
Life comes first, work funds my passions

questions.text: When reflecting on my life, I most value...
choices: The experiences and memories I've collected
The impact I've had on others
The peace and contentment I've found

questions.text: My biggest motivator in life is...
choices: Making a positive difference in the world

description: Share your perspectives on life's big questions.
